anya-e1214n1:2_0: Tuda byathāyaṁ (tu) nuda kkhepaṇe likha lekhaṇe,
anya-e1214n1:3_0: Kuca saṅkocane rica kkharaṇe khaca bandhane;
anya-e1214n1:11_0: Puṇo subha kiraye vatta vattane cata yācane,
anya-e1214n1:18_0: Kapa acchādane vappa vāraṇe khipa peraṇe;
anya-e1214n1:20_0: Supo saye chupo phasse (vattate) capa sāntvane,
anya-e1214n1:23_0: Sumbha saṁsumbhane jambha jambhane jubha nicchubhe,
anya-e1214n1:24_0: Ṭhubha niṭṭhubhane camu adane chamu hīḷane;
anya-e1214n1:26_0: Jhamu dāhe chamu adane irīya vattane’(pi ca),
anya-e1214n1:32_0: Tila snehe cila vāse hila hāve silu’ñchane,
anya-e1214n1:33_0: Bila bhede thūla caye kusacchedana pūraṇe;
anya-e1214n1:36_0: Phula phasse musa theyye thusa appikirayāya (tu)
anya-e1214n1:44_0: Nī pāpaṇe muna ñāṇe hana hiṁsāgatīsu (’pi)
anya-e1214n1:46_0: Pārakkhaṇamhi pā pāne brū vācāyaṁ viyattiyaṁ,
anya-e1214n1:47_0: Bhā dittiyaṁ mā pamāṇe (atho) yā pāpuṇe (siyā;)
anya-e1214n1:50_0: Asa (dhātu) bhuvi (khyāto) si saye sā samatthiye;
